page.title: 10LOCAL NEWSPAPERS IN L.S.
page.content: The{"Bedfordshire Times"}is published every Thursday at a cost of 17p.It is sold at the Post Office. It has a section about happenings in the villages;news;sport;and entertainments.Altogether it has 20 pages.The{"Bedfordshire on Sunday"}is a free paper which is delivered to each house. It has a sports page, a jobs page,some news and the rest is advertisements. It has 32 pages in all. There is a locally produced magazine called{"The Village {Voice"}which costs 1pound 30p and is delivered to people in Keysoe and Bolnhurst.It has news and information about forthcoming events. It also publishes poetry and stories about local history. There are local advertisements. It has 16 pages in all.
